headline: Casinos Push Congress to Undo Gambling Provision in Trump Tax Law
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The gaming industry’s push to reverse a provision in President Donald Trump’s tax law requiring gamblers to pay taxes on some of their losses is gaining bipartisan momentum in Congress. headline: MGM Resorts' Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: MGM's second-quarter earnings and revenues top estimates, fueled by BetMGM, MGM China and Regional performance despite an EPS dip.

headline: MGM Resorts to ‘restore growth trajectory’ in Vegas after Q2 declines
summary: The operator’s Vegas revenue was down in the quarter, but sports tourism and solid convention demand show promise for 2026, per CEO Bill Hornbuckle.

headline: Compared to Estimates, MGM (MGM) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for MGM (MGM) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.
